articles.description: A study has revealed that women in rural areas lag when it comes to getting screened for colorectal cancer as compared to their urban counterparts. | Health
articles.content:
A study has revealed that women in rural areas lag when it comes to getting screened for colorectal cancer as compared to their urban counterparts.
The research has been published in the 'JAMA Netwo… [+3597 chars]
